member.name: M:ShowMessage.ShowMessage.MsgShow(System.String,ShowMessage.MsgLanguage)
member.summary: Draggable Custom Message Dialogs with animated icons, waits for the user to click a button, Arabic Style.
member.param: Required. String expression displayed as message in the dialog box

member.name: M:ShowMessage.ShowMessage.MsgShow(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Custom Message Dialogs with Bottom_Left location
member.param: Required. String expression displayed as message in the dialog box
Required. String expression displayed in the title bar of the dialog box.

member.name: M:ShowMessage.ShowMessage.MsgShow(System.String,ShowMessage.MsgType,ShowMessage.MsgLanguage)
member.summary: Draggable Custom Message Dialogs with animated icons, waits for the user to click a button, Arabic Style.
member.param: Required. String expression displayed as message in the dialog box
Required. Message Type to display. the icon style, Example: information,Success,Critical,...etc

member.name: M:ShowMessage.ShowMessage.MsgShow(System.String,ShowMessage.MsgType,System.String)
member.summary: Custom Message Dialogs with multiple message Type, Bottom_Left location, and Arabic Style
member.param: Required. String expression displayed as message in the dialog box
Required. String expression displayed in the title bar of the dialog box.
Required. Message Type to display. the icon style, Example: information,Success,Critical,...etc

member.name: M:ShowMessage.ShowMessage.MsgShow(System.String,ShowMessage.MsgType,ShowMessage.MsgButton)
member.summary: Draggable Custom Message Dialogs with animated icons, waits for the user to click a button, Arabic Style.
member.param: Required. String expression displayed as message in the dialog box
Required. Message Type to display. the icon style, Example: information,Success,Critical,...etc
Required. Type of buttons to display. If you omit MsgButton, the default value is OkOnly.

member.name: M:ShowMessage.ShowMessage.MsgShow(System.String,ShowMessage.MsgType,ShowMessage.MsgButton,ShowMessage.MsgLanguage)
member.summary: Draggable Custom Message Dialogs with animated icons, waits for the user to click a button.
member.param: Required. String expression displayed as message in the dialog box
Required. Message Type to display. the icon style, Example: information,Success,Critical,...etc
Required. Type of buttons to display. If you omit MsgButton, the default value is OkOnly.
Required. button language and message layout direction. If you omit MsgLanguage, the default value is Arabic

member.name: M:ShowMessage.ShowMessage.MsgShow(System.String,ShowMessage.MsgType,System.String,ShowMessage.MsgLocation)
member.summary: Custom Message Dialogs with the possibility to change the location of the message
member.param: Required. String expression displayed as message in the dialog box
Required. Message Type to display. the icon style, Example: information,Success,Critical,...etc
Required. String expression displayed in the title bar of the dialog box.
Required. The location where the message is to be displayed. Example: Top_Right,Bottom_Center,...etc. If you omit MsgLocation, the default location is Bottom_Left.

member.name: M:ShowMessage.ShowMessage.About_MsgShow
member.summary: About Custom Message Dialogs. Programmed By: Eng Iyad Shaqura
